overview: Litmus: A Surfing Odyssey (1996)  "I wish that when they asked us: 'What is surfing?' I would have said it's a spiritual activity,  and not just a sport, because that's what put us on the wrong track..." ~ Nat Young  "The Riders, the boards, the places, the ruminations... Litmus was easily the finest surf film of it's decade." ~ Scott Hulet, The Surfer's Journal  Features: Derek Hynd, Wayne Lynch, Tom Curren, Joel Fitzgerald Animation by Mark Sutherland "Dream" Directed by Andrew Kidman, Jon Frank & Mark Sutherland Soundtrack by The Val Dusty Experiment, Yothu Yindi, The Screaming Orphans, Galaxy 500
title: Litmus: A Surfing Odyssey
